description: black, reds, white; red wool fringe on embroidered band collar; red, white, blue 3\" wide band on sleeves; 1/4\" red binding on all open edges; back approximately 7\" shorter than front; back 18\" is solid embroidered bands; 7-3/4\" x 3-1/4\" embroidered patch at top back; approximately 9\" beaded fringe hangs from rear neckband
title: Coat
